main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 10th August 1959 in Shelton, Connecticut. The object was observed to change color and passed out of sight in 3-4 minutes.
interesting points: The object's color changed to a bright orange-red after passing overhead.
The sighting was not conclusive, and the report requested further information from the witness.
The document indicates that six persons witnessed the object.
The report mentions a particular 'object' or 'device' under government interest or investigation, but the details have been redacted or omitted.
The sender of the report acknowledged the insufficiency of data and requested completion of an Air Force questionnaire for analysis and evaluation.
